plugin.lastUpdateInfo:
1.6.1 Minor bugfix
1.6.0: Adding passpack for /favorite commands (see Favorites Plugin).
plugin.description: Interactively helps you form links/x-callback-urls (and also Template Tags with runPlugin commands) to perform actions from within NotePlan or between other applications and NotePlan.
plugin.author: dwertheimer

plugin.commands.name: Get X-Callback-URL
arguments: Pass Back Results (e.g. if calling from another plugin)

plugin.commands.name: Create Link to Current Note+Heading
plugin.commands.description: External link to open this note

plugin.commands.name: Create Link to Current Line
plugin.commands.description: External link to open note to this line

plugin.commands.name: open todos containing links in browser
plugin.commands.description: Open URLs in all open todo items on the page

plugin.commands.name: open URL on this line
plugin.commands.description: Open the URL on the current line in the default browser

plugin.settings.title: Ask in Wizard if you want X-Success field
plugin.settings.description: X-Callbacks have an option of including an X-Success field. This allows NotePlan to return information back to a calling application. It's only used rarely, so by default, the wizard will not ask you if you want it. If you do want to use X-Success parameters, check this box and the wizard will ask you in the flow.
